meanings.sent1: The bestower of gifts made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: The kind bestower shared his wealth with those in need.
meanings.sent3: The bestower of smiles brightened up the room with his cheerful demeanor.
meanings.sent4: She was a bestower of hope in times of despair.
meanings.sent5: The bestower of wisdom guided us with his profound knowledge.

meanings.definition: To give or present something to someone.
meanings.sent1: He decided to bestower his old toys to the children's hospital.
meanings.sent2: She bestower a beautiful bouquet of flowers to her mother on her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The magician bestower a rabbit out of his hat to the audience's amazement.
meanings.sent4: The teacher bestower knowledge to her students every day.
meanings.sent5: The charity bestower food and clothing to those in need during the holidays.
